name: commonvideoparser
description: Gets video info from popular video sites (Youtube, Vimeo, Dailymotion, Google Drive)

scripts.build: npm run clean && cross-env BABEL_ENV=production babel lib -d dist
scripts.build:dev: npm run clean && cross-env BABEL_ENV=development babel lib -d dev -s
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run build

author: Rohan C <rohan_cy@outlook.com> (https://github.com/rnnc)
